summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, from East Lynn Street to Roanoke Street, in the City of Seattle, by grading and constructing sidewalk under Ordinance No. 15049, creating Local Improvement District No. 1364 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
